summary: This mod changes Lydia, she will use magic.
descriptionHtml:
Creation has been moved here.
Follower Magic Edit
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33460

This mod changes Lydia, she will use the magic.
You can change the magic that she will use.
It becomes powerful by the level at that time.

This is using Skyrim papyrus script.
Debugging may be imcomplete.
This is the test version.

Known problems:
Boundsword may disappear. (Setting the magic again, to recover.)
Sometimes does not come with her.
This mod can not be used with \"Extensible Follower Framework\"

This mod is two types.
There are Nordtype and Elftype.
Elftype may overwrite with the other mod. 

2 Files may be overwritten:
FemaleHeadRaces.tri
femaleheadbrowsrace.tri

Dual wield is available
She does not use bow and arrow.
Her speed increase 10%
Add Retexture Wench outfit (a slipshod job)
marriage is possible

UseMagic:

(Level 1-19)
OakFlesh
LesserWard
Healing
Flames
Frostbite
Sparks
FireBolt
IceSpike
LightningBolt

(Level 20-44)
StoneFlesh
SteadFastWard
FastHealing
FlameCloak
FrostCloak
LightningCloak
Flames
Frostbite
Sparks
FireBolt
IceSpike
LightningBolt

(Level 45-)
IronFlesh
GreaterWard
CloseWounds
Incinerate
IcySpear
ThunderBolt
WallofFlames
WallofFrost
WallofStorms

(All Level)
BoundSword


Ver 0.2
Add Script

Ver 0.1
FlameMagicOnly
Original magic (It reach to the target immediately.)
Gamebalance may worsen.
author: liny
